Serialized Form

Class MazeEnvironment implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

attributeLength

int attributeLength
The attribute Length specifies the number of bits that code each perceived position in the maze. It can be set to 2 or 3.

conLength

int conLength
The number of perceptions of the animat.

foodF

char[] foodF
The binary code of a food-F position (110).

foodG

char[] foodG
The binary code of a food-G position (111).

freeAtt

char[] freeAtt
The binary code of an empty position (000).

maxPayoff

int maxPayoff
The payoff provided at a food position.

maze

char[][] maze
The matrix that codes the maze (in binary)

nrActions

int nrActions
The number of generally possible movements.

obstacleO

char[] obstacleO
The binary code of an O-obstacle position (010).

obstacleQ

char[] obstacleQ
The binary code of a Q-obstacle position (011).

reset

boolean reset
Flag which is set to true when food was reached.

xcurrent

int xcurrent
The current position of the animat.

xsize

int xsize
The size of the maze in positions.

ycurrent

int ycurrent
The current position of the animat.

ysize

int ysize
The size of the maze in positions.

Class MPEnvironment implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

correct

boolean correct
Stores if the last classification was correct.

currentState

char[] currentState
Stores the current problem.

maxPayoff

int maxPayoff
Specifies the maximal payoff possible in this environment.

nrActions

int nrActions
In the Multiplexer problem there are two classifications possible!

posBits

int posBits
Specifies the number of position bits in the multiplexer problem.

reset

boolean reset
Is set to true after a classification was executed

Class PredictionArray implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

nr

double[] nr
The sum of the fitnesses of classifiers that represent each entry in the prediction array.

pa

double[] pa
The prediction array.

Class XClassifier implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

action

int action
The action of this classifier.

actionSetSize

double actionSetSize
The action set size estimate of the classifier.

condition

java.lang.String condition
The condition of this classifier.

experience

int experience
The experience of the classifier. This is the number of problems the classifier learned from so far.

fitness

double fitness
The fitness of the classifier in terms of the macro-classifier.

numerosity

int numerosity
The numerosity of the classifier. This is the number of micro-classifier this macro-classifier represents.

prediction

double prediction
The reward prediction value of this classifier.

predictionError

double predictionError
The reward prediction error of this classifier.

timeStamp

int timeStamp
The time the last GA application took place in this classifier.

Class XClassifierSet implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

cllSize

int cllSize
The actual number of macro-classifiers in the list (which is in fact equal to the number of entries in the array).

clSet

XClassifier[] clSet
The classifier list (in form of an array)

numerositySum

int numerositySum
The Sum of the numerosity in one set is always kept up to date!

parentSet

XClassifierSet parentSet
Each set keeps a reference to the parent set out of which it was generated. In the population itself this pointer is set to zero.

Class XCS implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

env

Environment env
Stores the posed problem.

maxProblems

int maxProblems
Specifies the number of exploration problems/trials to solve in one experiment.

nrExps

int nrExps
Specifies the number of investigated experiments.

outFile

java.io.File outFile
Stores the specified output File, where the performance will be written.

pop

XClassifierSet pop
Stores the current population of XCS.

Class XCSConstants implements Serializable
